channel.title: [PI] Adding Comp Hood

item.title: [PI] Adding Comp Hood
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

i added it successfully but my hood is invisible in inv, on ground, in trade, in stake, and on equip.

Then you didn’t add it successfully

Make sure you have the correct model id, and just adding it to the model folder will not work, you’ll need to load these models correctly through the client.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Adding Comp Hood
item.dc:creator: @chaosplaya09 chaosplaya09
item.description:
@chaosplaya09 wrote:

i added it successfully but my hood is invisible in inv, on ground, in trade, in stake, and on equip.

Here is code

case 4317: itemDef.modelid = 65273; itemDef.name = "Completionist hood"; itemDef.modelZoom = 760; itemDef.modelRotationY = 11; itemDef.modelRotationX = 81; itemDef.modelOffset1 = 1; itemDef.modelOffset2 = -3; itemDef.anInt165 = 65292; itemDef.anInt200 = 65310; itemDef.groundActions = new String[5]; itemDef.groundActions[2] = "Take"; itemDef.itemActions = new String[5]; itemDef.itemActions[1] = "Wear"; itemDef.itemActions[4] = "Drop"; itemDef.editedModelColor = new int[4]; itemDef.newModelColor = new int[4]; itemDef.editedModelColor[0] = -322; itemDef.editedModelColor[1] = -336; itemDef.editedModelColor[2] = -350; itemDef.editedModelColor[3] = -2541; itemDef.newModelColor[0] = -322; itemDef.newModelColor[1] = -336; itemDef.newModelColor[2] = -350; itemDef.newModelColor[3] = -2541; break;

PLEASE HELP!

Read full topic
